overview: Pass the Biscuits Mirandy!  Release Date: 8/23/43  Direction: James Culhane  Story: Ben Hardaway and Milt Schaffer  Animation: Paul Smith  Music: Darrell Calker  Notes:  Production Number: C-13  A Swing Symphony cartoon  James Culhane's directorial debut at Lantz
title: Pass the Biscuits Mirandy!
